object_name.value: Validate document is not associated with an inactive product.

title.value: Used to prevent documents from being made ''Effective'' while the relevant Product Registration Form is in a ''frozen'' state (i.e.''Inactive'').

repeating.value: OpenText Life Sciences Medical Device for Quality and Manufacturing Solution

OpenText Life Sciences Submission Storage and Viewing

This document cannot be made ''Effective/Final'' at this time, because it relates to a product ($value(product_code)) that's Inactive. If necessary, you should contact the relevant Product Manager(s) to arrange for the product registration to be re-activated, so you can make this document ''Effective/Final''.
cd_product_info where product_code = '$value(product_code)' and a_status= 'Inactive' and product_code != ' ' and domain ='Product Management'
